attributes.action: Sack all LABOUR MPs that made misleading expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that the Prime Minister sacks all LABOUR MPs that have been mis-leading with expense claims from the Fees Office.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot host party political material, such as reference to political parties. You can find more guidance here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms You should address concerns about political parties to the relevant party.
